eg.syntax

Class Coloring

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.syntax.Coloring

  • public class Coloring
extends java.lang.Object
    The coloring of either chunks of text (which also maybe the entire text) or single lines using a Colorable selected based on the language

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coloring(Lexer lex)
      Creates a Coloring

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void colorLine(java.lang.String allText, int pos)
      Colors the current line where a change happened (the entire text is scanned for block comments though).
      void colorMultipleLines(java.lang.String allText, java.lang.String section, int pos)
      Colors a subset of lines or the entire text (in any case the entire text is scanned for block comments).
      void selectColorable(Languages lang)
      Selects a Colorable based on the language and assigns it to this Lexer

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coloring

        public Coloring(Lexer lex)
        Creates a Coloring
        Parameters:
        lex - the Lexer object

    • Method Detail

      • selectColorable

        public void selectColorable(Languages lang)
        Selects a Colorable based on the language and assigns it to this Lexer
        Parameters:
        lang - the language which is one of the constants in Languages but not PLAIN_TEXT

      • colorMultipleLines

        public void colorMultipleLines(java.lang.String allText,
                               java.lang.String section,
                               int pos)
        Colors a subset of lines or the entire text (in any case the entire text is scanned for block comments). To scan the entire text section is equal to allText or null.
        Parameters:
        allText - the entire text of the document
        section - a section of allText. If null allText is used. If it does not start at a line start or does not end at line end the full lines are built
        pos - the pos within the document where a change happened.

      • colorLine

        public void colorLine(java.lang.String allText,
                      int pos)
        Colors the current line where a change happened (the entire text is scanned for block comments though).
        Parameters:
        allText - the entire text of the document
        pos - the pos within document where a change happened
